entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [GC] DATAS Tuning to improve pauses and heap volatility #93891
    9.0.0
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers. #93890
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: shifts #93887
  • SafeEvpPKeyHandle abort on macOS #93883
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Perf runs are broken #93880
    9.0.0
  • Use slnf files instead of slns per library node #93878
  • Use ProjectReferences for inbox libraries source projects #93877
  • Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #93876
  • [NativeAOT] DWARF debug info is generated for trimmed static fields #93868
  • NativeAOT Dumper? #93863
  • [Hot Reload] metadata.c:1326, condition `GINT_TO_UINT32(idx) < table_info_get_rows (t)' not met #93860
  • [mono][tests] Tests System.Reflection and System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel fail on Apple mobile platforms #93852
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] System.Tests.AppDomainTests.AssemblyLoad fails under jitosr_stress_random #93849
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\Baadbaad\\Baadbaad.cmd #93847
  • superpmi-collect hangs for libraries crossgen2 on linux-x64 and linux-arm64 #93846
    9.0.0
  • superpmi-collect failing for smoke_tests with error MSB4184: The expression "[System.IO.Directory]::GetDirectories(/mnt/vss/_work/1/s/payload/workitem/collectAssembliesDirectory/smoke_tests)" cannot be evaluated #93845
    9.0.0
  • Non-deterministic codegen in S_P_CoreLib_System_Reflection_Runtime_TypeInfos_RuntimeTypeInfo__GetPropertyImpl #93843
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose MemoryHandle's inner GCHandle and IPinnable #93841
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out #93840
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.cmd #93839

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make LocalBuilder abstract #93580
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Return Matcher from MatcherExtensions #93866
  • [libraries-jitstress] JIT: Assertion failed 'doesMethodHaveRecursiveTailcall()' during 'Morph - Global' #93844
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] driver.c got recompiled due to the order of methods changed #93680
    9.0.0
  • Remaining .NET 8 work for TensorPrimitives #92219
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] V8 segfault on perf pipeline #75459
    7.0.x
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) when building projects using "dotnet build" #93893
  • Compiling IJW tests fails with latest MSVC compiler #93856
  • R2RDumpTests failing under gcstress with "App Exit Code: 259" #93233
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support true singletons through IServiceCollection #92957
  • Large perf regressions in coreclr.dll native code #93837
  • TimeSpan.FromSeconds #93831
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'add != nullptr' during 'Calculate stack level slots' #93885
  • [runtime-jit-experimental] Assertion failed '!crossJump || emitComp->opts.compReloc' in jit_stress_splitting #93848
    9.0.0
  • aspnetcore tests having Dynamic.Proxy fails on ppc64le architecture #93770
  • CLRInformationVersion contains the buildNumber or version suffix #60532
    Future
  • IConfiguration with TimeSpan #93850
  • Runtime API compat errors when using latest build of 8.0 SDK #93867
  • NuGet should automatically send credentials after the first request with a HTTP 401 response #93871
  • Is order preservation of `Enumerable.GroupBy` guaranteed? #93857
  • [wasm] Runtime tests failing - `_Vector2_3_4::Vector2_3_4Test.RunVector*Tests` because of missing support for native libraries #93669
  • runtime-wasm-perf pipeline running on markdown only changes #93836
  • High number of connections waiting for SSL handshake #93208
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #93639
    9.0.0
  • [macOS] NativeAOT unable to produce executables when using the Xcode 15 toolchain #92491
    8.0.0
  • Dotnet core consuming lot of memory? #79287
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988.cmd #93640
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes.cmd #93641
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Loader.Tests` fail when run in randomized order #65672
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] WBT: Trigger workload integrity check #93898
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • JIT: fix bug introduced by recent throw helper block changes #93897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for numeric conversion in JIT #93896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix perf pipeline runs #93888
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Change OpenSslVersion to check for OpenSSL before attempting to determine openssl version #93886
    area-System.Security
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93875
    area-VM-threading-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Use deferred evaluation in ReadOnlyDictionary.Key/Value collections. #93870
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable not-yet-implemented EnC assertion #93864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file in illink/wasm build tasks #93854
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [mono][tests] Disable System.Reflection and System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel tests #93853
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add more data into MSTAT files #93842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: add missing recursive tail call detection logic #93892
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] InterpToNativeGenerator: sort signatures when emitting them #93894
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Override InformationalVersion for NativeAOT corelib too #93889
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Stable branding for .NET 8 GA #93807
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Improve performance of UnmanagedMemoryStream #93812
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Switch remaining tests using StandaloneApp project to use pre-built asset #93810
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Remove unnecessary rid argument to dotnet-restore #91844
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete unused or redundant Windows OS data structure definitions #93869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • reuse existing resource file #93539
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 9.0.0
  • Add RequiresProcessIsolation to R2RDumpTests #93820
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Revert "Use add_link_options and target_link_options in cmake (#92844)" #93838
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #91895
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix encoding cross-jumps at JIT time #93851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fixing createdump for RISC-V #93374
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Update APICompat settings under source build #93865
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix .yml dependency name for the emsdk transport package #93855
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update APICompat settings under source build #93862
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Make FailFast blocks cold" #93835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #93662
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Trim analyzer: Implement intrinsics handling of object.GetType #93732
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement API AppendAllBytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for number conversion when possible #89330
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Fix GitHub_93597 test build #93833
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up GenTreeCallFlags, remove INLINE_DATA define #93830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "X >= 0 && X < NN" to "X u< NN" #93834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93760
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Add explicit block fallthrough successor #93772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test NFloat.IsNegative against its native type equivalent #93734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the native cross compilers on win-arm64 #92443
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error MSB4014: Microsoft.Build.BackEnd.SdkResolution.SdkResolverException: The SDK resolver "Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver" failed while attempting to re solve the SDK "Microsoft.NET.Sdk". Exception: "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WorkloadManifestReader.WorkloadManifestCompositionException: .... #36392
  • dotnet new template for `Directory.Packages.props` file #36367
  • HotReloadProfileReader has O(2^N) performance issue #36356

Closed

  • Multiple RC versions listed in sdk-manifests #36385
  • [Hot Reload] RC2 Hot Reload of razor files does not work on macOS #36383

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update change to test for deadlocks in `packageInstall` #36393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • update .idea/ since it's a folder #36364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable dependabot updates to 8.0.1xx #36361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.3 to 22.1.4 in /eng/dependabot #36360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Fixes O(2^N) problem in HotReloadProfileReader #36356 #36357
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' into main #36363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Log SDK Culture mismatch message at Low importance to unblock SDK migration #36329
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add --no-http-cache option and hide --no-cache option for dotnet restore command #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0] Fix emsdk dep for stable version #36340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localize GenAPI #36366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test for hangs in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageInstall.Tests.dll #36119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra diag output #36115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • APICompat & GenAPI clean-up #36353
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0270 triggers over a #if #70514
  • VerifyOverloadsUpdated integration tests are failing #70511

Closed

  • Misleading error-message when mixing method overloads and named parameters #70515
  • Closing a document brings back stale diagnostics #70042
    17.9
  • `MetadataDecoder` doesn't support generic arguments in custom attributes #66370
    17.9
  • Cannot read attribute arguments from metadata when the original definition parameter is of a type parameter type #55190
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34223.21 #70516

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2299291 #70526
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove conflicting key binding for integration tests #70523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clean up inheritance hierarchy for CSharpAttributeData/VisualBasicAttributeData. #70519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test update to 17.8..218 #70518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Skip VerifyOverloadsUpdated integration tests #70512
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Utilize ConstantValueOne while emitting conditionals #70352
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Publish `EA.EditorConfigGenerator` #70510
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'use collection expression' with await-foreach calls #70494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Classify suffixes of numerical literals as keywords #70507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AllowAnonymous should be explicitly defined on Blazor Identity pages #51592
  • Stock Blazor Wasm template throws exception on some Chrome Android devices when AOT enabled #51590
  • [Blazor] Support persistent component state across enhanced page navigations #51584
    .NET 9 Planning
  • PersistComponentState inconsistent behavior #51583
  • [Blazor Web] Docs umbrella issue #51580
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Application models #51579
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Article on interactivity and render modes #51578
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Docs on Blazor Web security #51577
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Model binding docs #51576
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Form validation #51575
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Form handling #51574
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Enhanced navigation in depth doc #51573
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Streaming rendering doc #51572
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] In depth routing article #51571
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor] Tutorial for Blazor web that introduces the main framework features without going in depth #51570
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [Blazor web] Introduction article, explanation, and updated view of the app models #51569
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • [BUG] NullReferenceException when using multiple authentication schemes #51561
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51558
  • Add activities to SignalR invocations #51557
  • Cookie based authentication in .NET 6 Core API using Identity #51556
  • Blazor WebAssembly AuthenticationService.js not calling openid-configuration on certain redirect #51555

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext #51544
  • Fluent-UI or MudBlazor Interactivity fix breaks SigninManager #51554
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore 7 not compatible with .net 6 #51581
    Discussions
  • GitHub Action block on dotnet test with multiple WebApplicationFactory #51551
  • Error if radio button group is not selected #51385
  • BlazorWasm build benchmark broken #50821
    8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for .NET 8 #44265
    8.0.0
  • Blazor add auto generated management screens for Application user role and claim Management pages #51503
  • Issue with not nullable generic and nullable property #51553
  • Blazor Web App with Individual Auth Register.razor broken #51587
    8.0.0
  • I have searched the existing issues #51586
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Use A Local Account to Login_Label or instructions: No visual instructions are provided for the sighted users to identify the input fields are required fields. #51153
    8.0.0
  • Swagger spec should respect `body` and `response_body` when specified in gRPC JSON transcoding #51434
  • The client has disconnected Inner Exception - System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException 0x80070040 The specified network name is no longer available #50944

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51589
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51582
    area-networking
  • Use markup for documentation #51567
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update HubConnection.ts to provide a easier to read order of SignalR params #51559
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Helix retry: ChangingUserNameDuringReconnectLogsWarning #51591
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for .NET 8 #51527
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • add data-nosnippet attribute to MainLayout razor pages #51543
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Error using `dotnet-gcdump` on Android device #4348

Updated

  • Timed out when dotnet-trace connects to a dotnet app #3479
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Handle sessionId as ulong instead of long in EventPipeSession.cs. #4345
  • Fix ModuleLoadUnloadTraceData.ModuleID cast to be unchecked since its really a ulong member. #4354
  • Update Native AOT crash info with module base address #4351

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can I run my Maui projects with the Maui source code fully open to me in Visual Studio so I can test/solve bugs I find in the Maui code? #18270
  • CollectionView is rendered too tall #18269
  • Can't run unit tests with MAUI and net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #18268
  • Button.BorderColor not working on some platforms #18261
  • .NET 8: Not sure that the com.apple.security.get-task-allow entitlement in templates for MacCat is required #18259
  • .NET Maui Secondary ToolbarItem Issue on Windows #18258
    Backlog
  • IllegalArgumentException .NET MAUI 8 RC 2 #18251
  • [WinUI MAUI8] Mouse wheel is not working #18250
    Backlog
  • Maui Overdraws in Android even with completely blank or default project, also overdraws with empty Borders and BoxViews, hurting frame rates and performance targets #18245
  • .NET 8: Mac Cat app with WebView not inspectable in Safari Dev Tools #18243
    Backlog
  • Button ImageSource not Scaling as expected. #18242
    Backlog
  • [MAUI][.NET7] Place the cursor in the middle of the editor and the cursor will always move to the end for D10 page #18241
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Mac][.NET7] There is no dotnet bot image in the title bar of the G8 page #18239
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] [.NET 8 RC2] FlyoutItem Backgroundcolor Is not fully displaying #18238
    Backlog
  • Adding custom button to .NET MAUI Shell Tabs #18237

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core type inheritance to be ignored in OnModelCreating #32145
  • TIL Include() doesn't always load entities #32144
  • How to do this conversion? #32137
  • Possibility of generating migrations with Fluent API #32135
  • ef core optional one-to-many with nullable principal key #32131
  • UseLazyLoadingProxies is not effect on AddPooledDbContextFactory #32130
  • Improve query: don't select id twice in a union with owned entity #32128

Closed

  • TPT + JSON column throws: The exception Entity type references entities mapped to JSON but is not itself mapped to a table or a view #32129
  • Dynamic OR predicate on multiple columns #32092

PullRequests

Created

  • Make SQL CLR optional for running EF tests #32143
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32142
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32141
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.58.0 #32140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.2 to 1.10.3 #32139
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.14 #32087
  • Update branding to 6.0.25 #32086

Updated

  • [main] Fix to #32023 - Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32094
  • [main] Fix to #32062 - Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32102

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Use DecodeValue to check attribute values #17605
  • Pin scancode version #17602
  • Enable coherency dependency flow for emsdk #17601
  • Add coherent dependency for emsdk on runtime and run an coherency update #17600

Merged

  • Exclusion for unknown license ref in aspnetcore #17599
  • Fix minimum macOS version in the .pkg manifest #17480

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17482
